title: SPY's Happy Hour - May 2nd, 2014 - with mmx and Sam the Cooking Guy
description: SPY CEO Michael Marckx happily introduces TV's Sam the Cooking Guy, who visits SPY's Happy Hour to shed some light on what it means to be unabashedly true to yourself and comfortable just the way you are- along with the unexpected benefits of doing so.
